ARABIC: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Iblis, what is it that prevents you being among the prostrators?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How is it, O Iblis," said (the Lord), "you did not join those who bowed in homage?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Lord inquired: "Iblis! What is the matter with you that you did not join those who prostrated?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God asked Iblis, "What made you not join the others in prostration?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Allah, “O Iblis! What happened to you that you stayed apart from those who prostrated?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What is your reason for not being among the prostrate"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O Iblis! what excuse have you that you are not with those who make obeisance?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'What ails thee, Iblis, that thou art not among those bowing?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: O Iblis! What aileth thee that thou art not among the prostrate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God asked him, "What is the matter with you, that you are not among those who have prostrated themselves?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: O Iblis! what aileth thou that thou art not with the prostrates?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘O Iblis! What kept you from being among those who have prostrated?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! what is your reason for not being among those who prostrated themselves?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "O Iblis (Satan)! What is your reason for not being among the prostrators?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'iblis, what is the matter with you, that you do you not prostrate yourself'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “O Satan, what kept you from being among those who prostrated themselves?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:32] He, [God] exalted be He: ‘O Iblīs what is wrong with you, what prevents you, that you are not among those prostrating?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He) Allah, Exalted is He, (said: O Iblis!) O you who have despaired of My mercy, (What aileth you that thou art not among the prostrate?) why do you not prostrate to Adam?
